com.seashells.controller

Class RestServiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seashells.controller.RestServiceController

  • @RestController
public class RestServiceController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Rest Service controller class is responsible for handling all the rest calls from App Direct.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Natalie Villanueva

    • Method Detail

      • processNotifyOrder

        @RequestMapping(value="/create",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/xml")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> processNotifyOrder(@RequestHeader
                                                                                          org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders headers,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="url",required=true)
                                                                                          java.lang.String urlParam)
        Process notify order method handles the subscription order event. It validates that the rest call comes from App Direct, signs the url using OAuth and sends it back to App Direct. If valid we receive the event data and create the new customer account.
        Parameters:
        headers - the headers
        urlParam - the url param
        Returns:
        the response entity

      • processNotifyCancel

        @RequestMapping(value="/cancel",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/xml")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> processNotifyCancel(@RequestHeader
                                                                                           org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders headers,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="url",required=true)
                                                                                           java.lang.String urlParam)
                                                                              throws AccountCreationException
        Process notify cancel method handles the subscription cancel event. It validates that the rest call comes from App Direct, signs the url using OAuth and sends it back to App Direct. Then, we receive the event data and cancel the account.
        Parameters:
        headers - the headers
        urlParam - the url param
        Returns:
        the response entity
        Throws:
        AccountCreationException
